ValidationRule.description: To prevent RCI business users from confirming Witnesses and creating case roles/accounts.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Role__c,'Witness'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Confirm') ) || AND(ISPICKVAL(Role__c,'Witness for Appellant'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Confirm') ) || AND(ISPICKVAL(Role__c,'Witness for Claimant'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Confirm') ) || AND(ISPICKVAL(Role__c,'Witness for Defendant'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Confirm') ) || AND(ISPICKVAL(Role__c,'Witness for Division'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Confirm') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: RCI Related parties with the following roles: Witness, Witness for Appellant, Witness for Appellant, Witness for Claimant, Witness for Defendant, Witness for Division cannot be confirmed.
